Featured-image: CF080-navy-two-piece-mermaid-prom-evening-dress_p.jpg

Description: A simple but elegant two piece gown. The halter top has a peek-a-boo cut out at the bust. The skirt is floor length and flares in a mermaid style at the bottom. The slight pleating completes the look.
